body:
How embarrassing. The kext that fixes that refuses to load at boot like it's supposed to and I forgot about it. Hopefully, this is better and sorry for your wasted time: [link-pprof-sethwklein-psignalfix-2016-01-06.tar.gz](https://github.com/golang/go/files/80574/link-pprof-sethwklein-psignalfix-2016-01-06.tar.gz)

(BTW, if you need to check what versions I'm running, I pasted a bunch of them a couple-four posts up.)
